Articles.Content: Ooooo... That's looking awesome!

Ooooo... That's looking awesome!

Announcement

Those testers on the list on the original post will receive a test-release version in less than 24-48 hours. I dunno if I will add improvements still. Also, battling some bugs and unwanted mechanics. I'll take a rest at the moment.

unwanted mechanics

That's an interesting way of putting it. Need I be afraid? Oh, and I just realized that I'll have pretty much no time to test during the next ~36 to 40 hours. It sucks.

Announcement

Those testers on the list on the original post will receive a test-release version in less than 24-48 hours. I dunno if I will add improvements still. Also, battling some bugs and unwanted mechanics. I'll take a rest at the moment.

Cool. Jeb will be most pleased.
I dont think this has been asked yet vut whats the chance of getting a 3.75m rescale?

I dont think this has been asked yet vut whats the chance of getting a 3.75m rescale?

I'll probably do one after I'm done testing it for blackheart in normal size

I'll probably do one after I'm done testing it for blackheart in normal size

You should give the configs to me if that happens, cause I will post it so everyone knows.
Looking forward to release of this mod, I like what i have seen and for someone just learning how to do stuff "way to go!"

You should give the configs to me if that happens, cause I will post it so everyone knows.

Yeah that was the plan.
Might be good to say that I have sent the testers the Pre-release test version. After we fix some issues if there will be one (it's made for stock ksp so maybe if with modded), it will be released.
If you need any more tester I'm your man!
Sorry man, I already gave away the test to those who applied. Don't worry, I'll release as soon as I can, also, this will continue developing, I can assure you as a tester next phase if you want!
Mighty fine work, blackheart.

Hey BlackHeart, I would be happy to make a few models for a custom SLS for this command module.

I could make a single tank main stage like it's supposed to be.

Edited April 10, 2014 by GoldForest

Hey BlackHeart, I would be happy to make a few models for a custom SLS for this command module.

I could make a single tank main stage like it's supposed to be.

I appreciate the offer, man. Though, I made this as an extension of the SLS of the game. I wouldn't mind if you want to but this one here is just for the game's available SLS. Now if you make one, it's their choice if they want to have it or not. So you still can make one
Good news, it's nice and stable with FAR.
Aha. Have you all tested already? I might release it tomorrow or later. Seems like we're sailing smoothly

O. M. G.

I want this. Even if it's only for the LAS, RCS and engine, I want this!

Seriously Blackheart! You are awesome at this!
Yes, that LAS is a kick in the pants. It beats the stock one in all the performance figures that matter: Altitude and speed.

Yes, that LAS is a kick in the pants. It beats the stock one in all the performance figures that matter: Altitude and speed.

I really like the sound when it decouples though

*glug-voooooooosh*
What does SDHI stand for. I couldn't find anything relevant in google. I that a real initialism?
Sum Dum Heavy Industries. It's a mod company by Sumghai
Yeah the parts are really awesome
SDHI http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52362-0-23-5-Sum-Dum-Heavy-Industries-Service-Module-System-%28V1-9-5-Apr-2014%29
